# dokploy_organizations (Data Source)

Fetches the list of organizations in Dokploy.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `organizations` (Attributes List) List of organizations. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--organizations))

<a id="nestedatt--organizations"></a>
### Nested Schema for `organizations`

Read-Only:

- `created_at` (String) The creation timestamp of the organization.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the organization.
- `logo` (String) The logo URL of the organization.
- `name` (String) The name of the organization.
- `owner_id` (String) The ID of the user who owns the organization.
- `slug` (String) The URL-friendly identifier of the organization.
